target_module.name: avm-res-web-site
target_module.description: Terraform Azure Verified Resource Module for Web/Function App

mapping_reason: This diagnostic setting is typically managed as part of the parent AVM web app module configuration.
mapping_details: Diagnostic settings for web apps are exposed as input parameters for AVM module avm-res-web-site; no separate standalone module for azurerm_monitor_diagnostic_setting is required unless more advanced/custom monitoring use-cases exist.
